forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning transitioning to light rain late. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 21F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F with temps rising to near freezing. Winds light and variable.
